data: “My dear,” said the Idiot one morning, as he and his good wife and the two little ones, Mollie and Tommy, sat down at the breakfast-table, "now that we are finally settled in our new house I move we celebrate.

"My dear," said the Idiot one morning, as he and his good wife and the two little ones, Mollie and Tommy, sat down at the breakfast-table, "now that we are finally settled in our new house I move we celebrate.
Bangs, John Kendrick, 1862-1922; Richards, F. T. (Frederick Thompson), 1864-1921 [Illustrator]
